examples: an evil plot to brainwash and even kill innocent people
If something is evil , it is never mandatory.
Do you think that companies that engage in animal testing are evil ?

definitions.definition: Unpleasant , foul ( of odor, taste, mood, weather, etc. ).
Producing or threatening sorrow , distress , injury , or calamity ; unpropitious ; calamitous .
( obsolete ) Having harmful qualities; not good; worthless or deleterious.
examples: an evil beast; an evil plant; an evil crop

definitions.definition: ( computing , programming , slang ) Undesirable ; harmful ; bad practice.
examples: Global variables are evil ; storing processing context in object member variables allows those objects to be reused in a much more flexible way.

secondary_definitions: Unpleasant , foul ( of odor, taste, mood, weather, etc. ).
Producing or threatening sorrow , distress , injury , or calamity ; unpropitious ; calamitous .
( obsolete ) Having harmful qualities; not good; worthless or deleterious.
( computing , programming , slang ) Undesirable ; harmful ; bad practice.
